thread.title: WTF | Watch: This guy pranked people with a real-life Thor's hammer that only he could lift

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: WTF | Watch: This guy pranked people with a real-life Thor's hammer that only he could lift
text:
Marvel fans, prepare to geek out.
This replica of Thor's hammer Mjolnir from The Avengers and Thor may not let you conduct lightning or fly, but it does only respond to the 'worthy' touch of its creator Alan Pen , and his pranks on people trying to lift it are almost as good as watching the Avengers themselves try.
Via YouTube
MORE: Watch: Woman smashes up hairdresser with sledgehammer because they ruined her hair
MORE: Watch: Aussie teen makes epic Snapchat story after he's left home alone for the weekend
MORE: Watch: Awesome dog holds skipping rope for kids playing on street
